item.title: New Container: MAME
item.description: We have released a new container for MAME! MAME is a free and open-source emulator designed to emulate the hardware of arcade games, video game consoles, old computers and other systems in software on modern personal computers.
item.content:
We have released a new container for MAME!

MAME is a free and open-source emulator designed to emulate the hardware of arcade games, video game consoles, old computers and other systems in software on modern personal computers.
